data.actual_result: A draft of the mention is created, which the user cannot see or remove without using localstorage, but shows in quickswitcher drafts
data.short_description: Clicking mention button for invalid invites makes a draft in channels with no Send permissions
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter a channel where you have no send/type permissions - have someone send an invalid invite in that channel - click "ask [user] for another invite" - launch quickswitcher and observe drafts
